import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Experience = () => { return (

WORK EXPERIENCE:

Regions Bank
AVP Capital Markets Foreign Exchange Operations 2020 – Present
● Support the production and delivery of daily Capital Markets Loan Trading P&L reports
● Manage daily operations on capital markets foreign exchange loan book
● Work closely with Sales/Trading team to on onboarding and set up of clients onto various trading platforms
● Interpret credit agreements and serve as the direct point of contact to Borrows and Syndicate members

AVP Project Manager (Finance) 2017 – 2020
● Developed business requirements documents, resource plans and other enterprise project Life Cycle documents as required.
● Designed new policies and processes which resulted in the remediation of material weaknesses in the company’s financial reporting
● Developed KPI metrics used to track process improvement, which lead to better alignment with long term business objectives
● Manage the reporting and resolution of risks, issues and dependencies.

Bank of America
Project Manager (Credit Risk Technology) 2016 –2017
● Collaborated with Software Development and Quality Assurance teams to execute routine and unplanned software updates
● Managed risks and issues that affect the scope, schedule, and quality of software updates
● Managed the UAT process of migrating 1.5 million OTC Positions into a new core system
● Effectively ran daily working group meetings which resulted in zero delayed software updates

JPMorgan Chase New York, NY
Project Manager (Principal Risk) 2014 –2016
● Designed new data validation policies and processes to ensure compliance with international banking standards (BCBS 239)
● Negotiated service level agreements with upstream data providers which enabled the automation of 75% of all data sourcing
● Compiled data into a standardized report for BCBS program subcommittee meetings
● Designed and implemented data automation framework which reduced manual errors by 30%

Bank of America
Credit Risk Data Analyst (Credit Risk Technology) 2013 –2014
● Wrote and executed SQL and VBA test scripts to ensure the data integrity of 3million OTC positions (Swaps, Debt Options, Loans)
● Drafted and distributed Basel II and III exposure reports to risk management team
● Produced ad hoc and scheduled exposure reports covering a wide array of OTC products
● Completed root cause analysis and provide solutions for data quality issues
● Identified and tracked data quality issues using JIRA

); }; export default Experience;
